subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brees overcame a shaky start, throwing for one touchdown and running for another as he led the Saints past the Panthers on Thursday night to take over first place in the N.F.C. South.
snippet: Brees overcame a shaky start, throwing for one touchdown and running for another as he led the Saints past the Panthers on Thursday night to take over first place in the N.F.C. South.
